page.title: 10Industries in the Local Area
page.content: Within our block there are quite a few industries.A factory has recently opened called Score Ltd. They make Group 4 security alarms,locks and safes.A double glazing firm called C.R.Smith has a factory nearby.They are quite a large company and are sponsoring two top football teams in the Premier League.Tractor Shovels is next door to C.R.Smith.Tractor Shovels is a company which uses the biggest of machinery and equipment to mine or make quarries.They are digging just now behind Hill of Beath for stone for a new road nearby.Babygro is a company where mainly children's clothes are made,not by hand but by machinery such as sewing machines and knitting machines.They also have a shop with babies clothes for sale.
